title: Drawing, Interior of Temple of Glory and figured details
title_raw: Interior of Temple of Glory and figured details
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown washh
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d)
inscribed: At lower edge: Tempio della Gloria.
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Horizontal rectangle. Two drawings interior of temple of glory with tuba blowing Nike (?), detail drawing of the same person and ground plan of stage setting. Group of men and two women in landscape.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Interior of Temple of Glory and figured details. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown washh. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-125
